mapper.select:
SELECT r.userId, r.spaceId,r.reservationDate, r.startTime , r.endTime, r.purpose, r.memo, r.regdate,s.name as spaceName, u.name as person, u.email as email, u.phone as phone FROM hsca219.reservationInfo as r
LEFT OUTER JOIN hsca219.user as u ON r.userId = u.id RIGHT OUTER JOIN hsca219.space as s ON r.spaceId = s.id
WHERE r.reservationDate between CURDATE()-1 and (CURDATE() + INTERVAL 8 DAY)

SELECT r.id, r.userId, r.spaceId,r.reservationDate, r.startTime , r.endTime, r.purpose, r.memo, r.regdate,s.name as spaceName, u.name as person, u.email as email, u.phone as phone FROM hsca219.reservationInfo as r
LEFT OUTER JOIN hsca219.user as u ON r.userId = u.id RIGHT OUTER JOIN hsca219.space as s ON r.spaceId = s.id
WHERE u.name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or u.email LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY r.regdate DESC LIMIT #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) as listCnt FROM reservationInfo as r LEFT OUTER JOIN hsca219.user as u ON r.userId = u.id
WHERE u.name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or u.email LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hsca219.reservationInfo (userId, spaceId, startTime, endTime, purpose, reservationDate) VALUES (#{userId}, #{spaceId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{purpose},#{reservationDate});
mapper.update: UPDATE hsca219.officeHour t SET t.startTime = #{value} WHERE t.id = #{id}
UPDATE hsca219.officeHour t SET t.endTime = #{value} WHERE t.id = #{id}
